resources.string:
Document Organizer is a very useful app, You can easily organize documents through this app, we add the document categorically to the app it will be synced to the cloud.

 Document Organizer app that creates a digital archive of your personal files, including documents, notes, cards, and receipts. Take a photo of paper files or upload digital files, and sort in file folders for maximum convenience.

 No more worrying about losing or exposing your personal information â€“ sync document into the cloud.

 if we can, we will be able to receive our documents from any device via our Gmail account login. we can easily download the documents at any time if we want.

string.name: about_list
string.ol:
Capture or Select Document from gallery/Folder. \n
\tEdit Document and save. \n
\tSync the document into the cloud. \n
\tIf do not have a sign in then need to sign up and sign in. \n
\tDocument can be stored by categorically. \n
\tRename document, Update document, Delete document, Search document. \n
\tSort Document by Name, Category, Date, Size.

resources.string: 1. Capture or Select Document from gallery/Folder.
3. Sync the document into the cloud.
4. If do not have a sign in then need to sign up and sign in.
5. Document can be stored by categorically.
6. Rename document, Update document, Delete document, Search document.
7. Sort Document by Name, Category, Date, Size.
Send and receive changes between device data and cloud data, allowing you to create synchronize your data between multiple devices.
